content.paragraph: My education at Chas Academy is fairly new but I've already learnt a ton. My understanding of HTML and CSS were basic before but within a few weeks they've expanded drastically.

My high school education equipped me with in-depth understanding of technical abilities such as C# programming for Unity and Blender 3D modeling. Furthermore, I learned how to adapt to various surroundings and developed my teamwork, communication, groupwork, cooperation, and networking skills.
content.name: .//LBS Kreativa Gymnasiet
